sense.def:
Kadar človek
perches on a wall or table
, sedi na robu stene ali mize.

seg.quote: Dr Quilty perched on the corner of his desk.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
perches one thing on another
, eno stvar položi na vrh ali rob druge, tako da se zdi, da lahko pade dol.

seg.quote: He would take out his spectacles and perch them on the end of his nose.
The building perches precariously within a few feet of a sudden drop.

sense.def:
Kadar ptica
perches on a branck or a wall
, sedi na veji ali zidu.

A perch
je kratka palica, na kateri sedi udomačena ptica.
